article_title: Despite GOP Claims, Obamacare's Not Causing Employers To Drop Coverage

article_metadata.description: Employers aren't dropping health care coverage, according to Aon Hewitt, despite election-year charges by Republican Presidential candidates Donald Trump and Ted Cruz
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
